content:
{"name": "St. Paul United Methodist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The Lord's Pantry and the Lord's Clothes Closet are open twice a month:
*  The First (1st) Saturday from 8 am - 10:30 am  
*  The Third (3rd) Thursday from 3pm - 5:30pm.

Food and clothing are offered on a first come, first serve basis.  Please bring and ID.  We use a drive-thru distribution, a vehicle is strongly suggested.  

Clients may come to the Lord's Pantry twice a month and the Lord's Clothes Closet once a month.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.stpaul-umc.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1400 G St", "address_2": null, "city": "Woodbridge", "state_province": "VA", "postal_code": "22191", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.663506, "longitude": -77.257176}, "phones": [{"number": "(703) 494-2445", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "21:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
